name: Dahlia Town
description:
Inside this mysterious village, you walk around talking to workers at the factory of an anti depressant. While the reputation of this anti depressant is mostly positive, ever since the product is released to the market, people have been missing. You are undercover to see if there is any relation of this anti depressant to missing people. However, not everything is what it seems, not even the one you trust the most. Can you uncover the secret, or will you be found first?

Controls: 

Use ←→ arrows to control the character

Press F to start and continue conversation

Press M to go back to menu

Credits:

Design: Patrick Queiroz

Art: Emery Plyler

Code: Ruby Tseng

Music: Patrick Queiroz
